docs.lead_paragraph: WHITE PLAINS THE baby-formula controversy marched into White Plains last week. Church leaders, housewives and children demon strated at the Nestle subsidiary here protesting the Swiss conglomerate's promotion of infant formula in the developing countries of the third world.

headline.main: White Plains Groups Join Nestle Protest; Baby-Formula Protest at Nestle

docs.abstract: Tessa Melvin article on Nestle's promotion of powdered infant formula in 3d world nations (M)
